settings.tab1_content:
We put a stop to plastic pollution.

We use only natural materials: 100% Organic Cotton fabric sewn with 100% Cotton threads. Even our labels are 100% Cotton.

This is the first step in making our entire catalog petroleum-free and biodegradable.
settings.tab2_content:
We perfected the supply chain.

No more international supply chain with a high carbon footprint and no transparency.

Our cotton is cultivated, spun into yarn, knitted into fabric, and sewn into the perfect pair of {{ product.metafields.custom.section_1_accordion_1_1_weight.value }} in our studio, exclusively in Peru.
settings.tab3_content:
We redefined sustainability.

These are not just another organic pair of {{ product.metafields.custom.section_1_accordion_1_1_weight.value }} We use Pima Cotton, native to Peru, that uses zero toxic chemicals.

Peruvian Pima is the parent fiber to all premium cotton, unbelievably soft and breathable.

settings.heading: Anatomy of Your {{ product.metafields.custom.section_1_accordion_1_1_weight.value }}
settings.content:
Plastic-Free Ingredients
•Fabric: 100% Organic Pima Cotton
•Fabric Dye: Natural Plant-Based
•Fabric Finishing: Silicone (OEKO-TEX)
•Thread: 100% Pima Cotton
•Thread Dye: Natural
•Label: 100% Organic Cotton
•Label Ink: Synthetic (GOTS)

settings.heading: Fabric Care
settings.content:
• Machine wash cold
• Tumble dry low

settings.custom_liquid:
<script>
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    const accordions = document.querySelectorAll('collapsible-row details');

    accordions.forEach((accordion) => {
      accordion.addEventListener('toggle', function () {
        if (this.open) {
          accordions.forEach((other) => {
            if (other !== this && other.open) {
              other.removeAttribute('open');
            }
          });
        }
      });
    });
  });
</script>

  }

    }

   .image-with-text__content {

      width: 100% !important;
      box-sizing: border-box;
    }
.image-with-text {
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column-reverse!important;
    }
    .image-with-text__content--inner {
      width: 100% !important;
    }
#section1 .image-with-text__content {
margin:0px!important;}
}

  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 768px) {
 #section2 .image-with-text, #section4 .image-with-text, #section6 .image-with-text,  .image-with-text {

}
</style>

settings.text: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.heading: Wear to Care: The Impact You Make
settings.content:
{{ product.metafields.custom.section_1_with_every | metafield_text }} {{ product.metafields.custom.section_1_accordion_1_1_weight.value }} you:

  • Support a transparent and sustainable brand
  • Contribute to a plastic-free future.

settings.heading: Our Pledge: No More Greenwashing
settings.content: We made these {{ product.metafields.custom.section_1_accordion_1_1_weight.value }} as a part of our mission to create the most sustainable clothes - transparently, without greenwashing. By sharing all steps of our production with you, we aim to change the fashion industry.

custom_css: @media screen and (max-width: 768px) {.image-with-text {display: flex; flex-direction: column-reverse !important; padding-bottom: 8%; }}
img_and_text_prod_section1_HwC4zB.name: Img&Text-prod-section1

settings.text:
Long and smooth Pima Cotton staple fibers, native to Peru, offer supreme quality and extraordinary softness.

  • Resistant to wrinkling and pilling
  • PFAS-free
  • Longer durability
  • Silky soft on the skin
  • Hypoallergenic

custom_css: a {text-decoration: underline; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; color: #9396a0; letter-spacing: 0.04rem;}
img_and_text_prod_section2_KVBVcA.name: Img&Text-prod-section2

settings.text: The first step of our ongoing mission to become a petroleum-free brand, is creating 100% plastic-free clothes.

settings.heading: 100% Biodegradable: No Microplastics
settings.content:
We created 100% plastic-free and biodegradable clothes so that you can wear them knowing that you are not contaminating the world with microplastics.

Microplastics are not only polluting the environment but are also found in our bloodstream.

settings.heading: Cruelty-Free & Vegan
settings.content:
This item doesn't harm any animals in its production and doesn't contain any animal-based ingredients.

Wearing AYA's clothing keeps the Earth and wildlife free of chemical and microplastic contamination.

settings.text: One Studio, One Country, One Mission
We use natural local resources and a short transparent supply chain on our mission to teach you how clothes should be made.

settings.heading: Designed & Made in One Country: Peru
settings.content:
Contrary to industry norms, every step involved in making our clothes is done in only one country: Peru, the home of our family. Our production in Peru includes fiber sourcing, yarn spinning, fabric knitting, dyeing, finishing, and garment sewing.

From Peru, our clothes go straight to California or Europe on its journey to you.

settings.heading: Low Carbon Footprint
settings.content: Manufacturing in one country allows us to greatly reduce our carbon footprint and freight shipping. This is a major step on our journey to becoming a carbon negative company.

settings.heading: Transparency & Traceability
settings.content: We established our own textile production studio which means that we are not only a clothing brand but also a manufacturer. This gives us more control over the processes and ingredients used in our production, and allows us to be transparent and traceable.

custom_css: a {text-decoration: underline; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; color: #9396a0; letter-spacing: 0.04rem;}
img_and_text_prod_section6_K7wx6X.name: Img&Text-prod-section6

settings.text:
Our 100% Natural Dye fabrics go the next step in making the most sustainable clothes. This collection doesn't contain any toxic or synthetic dyes, and it's designed to leave no trace in the environment at the end of the garment's lifespan.

Our natural colors:

  • Natural White: Undyed cotton
  • Natural Blue: Indigo leaves
  • Natural Gray: Eucalyptus leaves
